name: Hitman: Blood Money
notes: Changing the video resolution in-game crashes the game. Restart the game after changing the resolution or edit drive_c/GOG Games/Hitman Blood Money/HitmanBloodMoney.ini in the game's directory instead.

files.installer: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- dx2010: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
- installer: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Hitman Blood Money/HitmanBloodMoney.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: dx2010
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2003 win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /VERYSILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Running Setup, please wait...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
wine:
  esync: true
  version: tkg-protonified-4.1-x86_64
